sect2.title: Installation of FreeType2
sect2.para: Install FreeType2 by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i ../freetype-&freetype2-version;-ahhint.patch && sed -i "s%\/\* #define TT_CONFIG_OPTION_BYTECODE_INTERPRETER \*\/%#define TT_CONFIG_OPTION_BYTECODE_INTERPRETER%" \ include/freetype/config/ftoption.h && ./configure --prefix=/usr && make && make install
